sys_script_include.description: Get the record count of the urgency with level 1 category.
sys_script_include.name: getUrgencyCount

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_0552374b2fc62010fdd651172799b6f2
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.getUrgencyCount</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>Get the record count of the urgency with level 1 category.</description><name>getUrgencyCount</name><script><![CDATA[var getUrgencyCount = Class.create();

getUrgencyCount.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
   getCount: function(){
var now_GR = new GlideRecord('incident');
now_GR.addQuery('urgency', 1); 
now_GR.query(response);
 
function response(result) {
    while(result.next()) {
        return result.getValue('number'); 
    }
}
	},

   type: 'getUrgencyCount'
												 
});

]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-05 14:57:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>0552374b2fc62010fdd651172799b6f2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getUrgencyCount</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0552374b2fc62010fdd651172799b6f2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-06 03:41:51</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
